name: Cooch Behar Anasristi
briefDescription: Genesis : “ Cooch Behar Anasristi”(COB A) was established in 2005 with the initiative of some likeminded socially oriented youths from Cooch Behar District of West Bengal with an objective to disseminate scientific temperament, cultural diversity as well as the reflection of the community of Indian scientists and thinkers for public understanding of science and culture together. To meet this goal the  organisation later on in the year 2008got registered as a non-profit social organisation under West Bengal Society Register act 1984 (Registration No. S/L1/52902). The organisation being autonomous depends on grants and donations: be it personal, governmental and from organisations.
